text:
Good job, Mano.
How was the joint training camp?

Well...
I think I did my best...

I see. If you feel satisfied with your practice,
that's what matters most.

Actually, I talked to Kiriko,
and after that, I felt much better...

Is that so?
I should thank Kiriko too...

Yes... And also,
thank you, Producer.

Yes.
Because you organized this joint training camp.

Thanks to you, Producer-san,
I had a really great time...

Haha, I'm glad I could be of help to you.
Let's try planning something like this again.
